Frequently Asked Questions

  • General
  • Payment
  • Gifting and Promotions
  • Other

What's Nitro?

Nitro is a subscription service that unlocks features and perks across Discord, giving you more ways to have fun and express yourself.

How does Nitro Work?

When you subscribe to Nitro, you get access to features that were previously locked for you - like using custom emoji anywhere, uploading bigger files, setting a custom video background, and more. When the subscription ends, youâ€™ll lose access to the perks.

Whats the difference between nitro and Nitro basic?

Design of choice for many of the world exercitation ullamc ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in repreh esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur.

How much does nitro work?

Cost varies depending on your country and plan. You can check Nitro prices under User Settings > Nitro in either the desktop or mobile apps.

Where can i buy Nitro?

You can purchase Nitro by visiting the Nitro tab in User Settings, or in the Nitro page under Home on desktop. On mobile, visit User Settings by tapping your user icon in the bottom bar, then select Get Nitro.

What Payment methods do you accept?

We accept a variety of payment methods, which you can learn more info on here!

Do you offer custom software development services?

Yes, we specialize in custom software development. We can design and develop software applications tailored specifically to your business requirements, whether it's a mobile app, web application, or enterprise software.

Are Nitro's Real?

Yes! You can purchase a Nitro gift through the Nitro page on desktop or the Nitro Gifting tab within mobile under User Settings. Additionally, you can send a quick gift in a channel by selecting the gift icon on desktop or mobile. If someone sends you a gift, you can see what it looks like here. You can also buy Discord Nitro directly on Amazon.com (United States only).
